roleset.name: when good mortgages go bad
roleset.note: FORECLOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foreclose' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from foreclose.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Many troubled properties]-1 haven't been foreclosed on *trace*-1 and are hard to identify, says Albert I. Berger, who heads the Secaucus, N.J., office of Helmsley-Spear Inc., a real estate brokerage.
